subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton played in his first game since Dec. 20 and Carmelo Anthony scored 34 points as the Knicks held off a late rally by the Pistons to pick up their third victory in four games.
snippet: Raymond Felton played in his first game since Dec. 20 and Carmelo Anthony scored 34 points as the Knicks held off a late rally by the Pistons to pick up their third victory in four games.
